Protection.NameOfProject: Improving the lifes of vulnerable returnee- and host community households in Sinuni and Wana sub- districts through the provision of protection services and agricultural support (multi-cluster project)
Protection.Objective: The overall objective of the protection component is to expand general protection services (including legal assistance/counselling, PSS & HLP) to underserved areas with high needs in order to ensure safe and dignified returns and sustainable lives of people living in Arab villages and Neighboring villages in Sinuni Sub district, Sinjar districts.

ProtectionHighlights.GeneralHighlights: CBP team distributed (10 wheelchairs) and (11 toilet chairs) provided by UNHCR through SWEDO to vulnerable disabled individuals in Duhok center, Sumel, Zakho, Bardarash and Amedi districts.
CBP team distributed 15 packs of size 3 baby diapers that were provided by UNHCR for the vulnerable individuals for a family in Duhok-Baroshke.
CBP team distributed 107 baby diapers of sizes 2 and 3 in Duhok Center, Shekhan Center and Zakho center districts.
Because of the covid-19 coronavirus pandemic, all government entities and courts have very limited capacity to process cases due to lack of staff and only processing a fixed number of cases per day.
Courts have stopped receiving new cases after 15th of Nov 2020 because of the annual inventory.

Throughout the reporting period, our team face one challenge in reporting because due to the public holiday in the governmental departments. So, most of the camp was not working, that is why some camps are missing information.

SGBVActivities.Activity: protection needs identified and referred to specialized services
FGDs are being conducted for parents/caregivers about sexual harassment in Domiz1 camp.
Service providers  trained on GBV prevention and referral
POCs trained on GBV prevention and referral

SGBVHighlights.GeneralHighlights: CLC- Domiz Manager has attended monthly CCM meeting that was online, during the meeting update and more plans for the camp have been discussed for December 2020.
CLC- Domiz Manager has attended monthly CCM meeting that was online, during the meeting update and more plans for the camp have been discussed for December 2020.
CLC- Domiz Manager has attended Duhok monthly GBV WG meeting during the meeting update and more plans for the camp have been discussed for December 2020.

CLC-Gawilan manager has attended Gawilan monthly meeting which was conducted by camp management in camp management office during the meeting all updates from other agencies shared with activities, plans for December and challenges inside the camp.
APM for GBV has attended five days online workshop on “PSEA Investigation” which was conducted by UNICEF.
APM for GBV and CLC-Domiz Manager have attended GBVIMS monthly meeting through Skype.

HealthHighlights.GeneralHighlights: We supplied all RH clinics of IDPs and Refugee camps in addition to three maternity hospitals in Duhok , Zakho , Amadia  with all basic PPEs and basic RH clinics needs
we  implement  a new isolation unit for covid 19 in Zakho maternity hospital. the consutraction of the unit is totally completed , all medical supplies and Basic materials were provided completely .

we conducted in coordination with DOH an open discussion meeting to all RH doctor in (Directorate of preventative health ) regarding the challanges that  we faced in 2020 and How we can avoid them in the next year.
we supplied all covid19 awarness units in 10 IDP camps and 4 Refugee camps with basic PPEs
